ComicInfo.Penciller: Mœbius,Russell Walks,Nicole Hollander,Andreas Martens,Rick Geary,Olivier Vatine,Moebius,Nicole Hollander,Andreas Martens,Rick Geary,Olivier Vatine,Moebius
ComicInfo.Summary:
The latest in Andreas' tales of the ever-intriguing and endlessly enigmatic Rork premieres this issue with "Rork: Capricorn," and the Jean-Michel Charlier/Moebius saga of gunslinging, greed, and true love continues with "Blueberry: Arizona Love." This issue also features Nicole Hollander's "Sylvia," who analyzes age-related behavior in cats; a sequel to Rick Geary's observations of life, the universe, and everything in "Galaxy II"; another irreverent sci-fi sampling starring Cailleteau & Vatine's "Stan Pulsar," and a beautifully painted cover by Russell Walks. *Story Titles * Sylvia Rork: Capricorn Chapter 1 Galaxy II: Wandering the Galaxy Stan Pulsar Blueberry: Arizona Love Chapter 2
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/cheval-noir-47/4000-37875/
